definitions: a strong, flexible board from which someone can jump in order to gain added impetus when performing a dive or a gymnastic movement.
shortDefinitions: strong, flexible board from which someone can jump

definitions: a thing that lends impetus or assistance to a particular action, enterprise, or development

examples.text: an economic plan that may be the springboard for recovery

shortDefinitions: thing that lends impetus or assistance to particular action or development
